com.silvergobletgames.sylver.graphics

Class TextureLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.silvergobletgames.sylver.graphics.TextureLoader

  • public class TextureLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the loading of textures from disk. It will load textures and store them in memory for retreival.

      • loadTexture

        public void loadTexture(java.net.URI resourceURI,
               java.lang.String identifier)
        Loads a texture into memory. Works for a URI pointing to a location inside a .jar, or on disk. The texture can be retrieved by the given identifier. Can load .png, .jpg, .gif, .tga files.
        Parameters:
        resourceURI - URI pointing to the location of the texture
        identifier - String identifier identifying the texture
